name: SwordPlay (Alpha)
description:
SwordPlay (Alpha)

Its a 3D, free roam fighting game. The fighting mechanics is a bit unique, and we hope it would be satisfying for all you fans of the fighting genre.

PLEASE BE AWARE THAT THE GAME HAS ONLY BEEN RECENTLY RELEASED, AND HAVE VERY LOW TRAFFIC. IF YOU WOULD LIKE TO TRY THE CURRENT 1VS1 MULTIPLAYER MODE, CONSIDER GETTING A FRIEND ON BOARD.

Also, the game now has an official Discord channel.  Please join to share any questions or feedback:

https://discord.gg/5ynmuSB

Final Release Features:

- 3 Playable characters

- Axes Aligned Attack system (AAAtk)

- Body lock system.

- Strategies are based on player state, opponent state and over all environment state.

- Large fighting stages.

- Anime style characters and environment.

- 3 vs 3 multiplayer mode.
